titles.title: Counseling for Career Choice Act
To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide grants to States to establish a comprehensive school career counseling framework.
Counseling for Career Choice Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Counseling for Career Choice Act
This bill directs the Department of Education to award competitive grants to state educational agencies and, through them, subgrants to eligible entities (e.g., local educational agencies) to implement comprehensive school career counseling programs.
